name: cl
title: Custom Launcher
description: Automation at your fingertips, search through websites, run my scripts easily, everything from the Run window

name: blur
title: blur
description: Installs blur, free, open-source interpolation/blur creation software: fast, convenient to use and feature packed.

name: voukoder
title: Voukoder
description: Passively installs Voukoder, parses the releases and launches the connector with passive arguments

name: lcl
title: Lunar Client Lite
description: Installer for Aetopia's Lunar Client Lite, a fast, simple and unlocked launcher for Lunar Client.

name: graal
title: GraalVM
description: Grabs some community edition builds from GraalVM and patches Lunar Client Lite with the correct settings.

name: mpv
title: MPV Protocol
description: Adds a protocol handler so it opens MPV when you click on mpv:// links, designed to help with non-embeddable Discord videos.
